page.title: 14VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are several thriving village organisations. The Women's Institute meet at the W.I.Hall Ireby at 7.30p.m. every second Wednesday of the month. There are over 40 members and they have talks and demonstrations given by visitors. The Mothers' Union meet at the Bell Institute on the first Wednesday of every month. They have about 30 members and are concerned with family life and have talks with a Christian emphasis. The Ireby Village Sports Committee raise funds which are used for the benefit of the children and Over 60s. in the village. A village sports day is organised in summer and a Christmas entertainment for the Over 60s in December. Other village organisations include a PLaygroup, Young Farmers, Ireby Players Group, Youth club and a Snooker Club.
